Name: Arcadia 2001 and its variants and clones
3DO Interactive Multiplayer
CPU: RISC CPU ARM60 based on ARM architecture @ 12.5 MHz

Name: Atari Jaguar
CPU: Motorola 68000 @ 13.295 MHz, Custom 32-bit graphics RISC "Tom" @ 26.59 MHz, Custom 32-bit sound RISC "Jerry" @ 26.59 MHz

Name: Nintendo 64DD
"Bits": 32-bit co-processor (uses 64-bit N64 processor as main processor)

Name: Xbox
CPU: Custom 733 MHz Intel Pentium III "Coppermine-based" processor

Name: Xbox 360
CPU: Big-endian architecture 3.2 GHz PowerPC Tri-Core Xenon

Name: PlayStation 3
CPU: 3.2 GHz Cell Broadband Engine with 1 PPE & 7 SPEs

Name: Zeebo
CPU: ARM11 / QDSP-5 in Qualcomm MSM SoC running at 528 MHz

Name: PlayStation 4
CPU: Semi-custom 8-core AMD x86-64 Jaguar 1.6 GHz CPU (integrated into APU)

Name: Xbox One
CPU: Custom 1.75 GHz AMD 8-core APU (2 quad-core Jaguar modules)

Name: Xbox Series X/S
CPU: Custom 8-core AMD Zen 2;Series X: 3.8 GHz, 3.6 GHz with SMTSeries S: 3.6 GHz, 3.4 GHz with SMT

Name: PlayStation 5
CPU: Custom 8-core AMD Zen 2, variable frequency, up to 3.5 GHz
